column1: He then went off to cut the nettles under the straggling roses, satisfied that water, should it ever reappear, would no longer escape from the pool.

column1: I do not think that there can be any combination that we did not try during my time in the parks, and the only thing that did not look positively awful were the short growing, pale, less intense blues of violas and lobelia under pink and red roses — other colours and growing heights were invariably a tasteless rag - bag.
